content: The [mournful, inspired] oracle (a burden to be carried) concerning Egypt:
In that day the Egyptians will become like [helpless] women, and they will tremble and be frightened because of the waving of the hand of the  of hosts, which He is going to wave over them.

The land of Judah [Assyria’s ally] will become a terror to the Egyptians; everyone to whom Judah is mentioned will be in dread of it, because of the purpose of the  of hosts which He is planning against Egypt.
In that day five cities in the land of Egypt will speak the language of [the Hebrews of] Canaan and swear  to the  of hosts. One [of them] will be called the City of Destruction.
In that day there will be an altar to the  in the midst of the land of Egypt, and a memorial stone to the  near its border.

It will become a sign and a witness to the  of hosts in the land of Egypt; for they will cry to the  because of oppressors, and He will send them a Savior, a [Great] Defender, and He will rescue them.

And so the  will make Himself known to Egypt, and the Egyptians will know [heed, honor, and cherish] the  in that day. They will even worship with sacrifices [of animals] and offerings [of produce]; they will make a vow to the  and fulfill it.
The  will strike Egypt, striking but healing it; so they will return to the , and He will respond to them and heal them.
In that day there will be a highway from Egypt to Assyria, and the Assyrians will come into Egypt and the Egyptians into Assyria; and the Egyptians will worship  serve [the ] with the Assyrians.
In that day Israel will be the third  with Egypt and with Assyria [in a Messianic league], a blessing in the midst of the earth,
whom the  of hosts has blessed, saying, “Blessed is Egypt My people, and Assyria the work of My hands, and Israel My heritage.”
